* The etymology of "settentrïone" is uncertain, but it is thought to be derived from the Latin phrase "septem triones", meaning "seven plow oxen". * The etymology of "nebbia" is also uncertain, but it is thought to be derived from a Germanic root meaning "mist" or "fog".
